display_name: Overall Respiratory Disturbance Index (RDI) at 0% desaturation with arousal
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas with arousal) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60*(hremba +hroa + hnrba + hnroa +carba + caroa + canba + canoa + oarba + oaroa + oanba + oanoa + marbpa + maropa + manrbpa + manropa) / slpprdp
